### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE transportation_schedules (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  schedule_date DATE,
  vehicle_type VARCHAR(50),
  route VARCHAR(100),
  departure_time TIME,
  arrival_time TIME
)

### STATEMENT

UPDATE transportation_schedules SET route='Route A' WHERE id=1;
